TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScriptManagerProxy extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 當 控制項已在父項目中定義時，可讓內容頁面和使用者控制項等巢狀元件將指令碼和服務參考加入頁面中。

span.span: Enables nested components such as content pages and user controls to add script and service references to pages when a control is already defined in a parent element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 網頁上只能包含一個控制頁面上，直接或間接內巢狀或父元件。A Web page can contain only one control, either directly on the page or indirectly inside a nested or parent component. 控制項可讓您將新增指令碼和服務內容頁面和使用者控制項的主版頁面或主應用程式頁面已經包含如果控制項。The control lets you add scripts and services to content pages and to user controls if the master page or host page already contains a control. 當您使用控制項，您可以加入所定義的指令碼和服務集合控制項。When you use the control, you can add to the script and service collections defined by the control. 如果您不想要包含特定的指令碼和服務，每個頁面，其中包含特定控制項，您可以移除從控制項。If you do not want to include specific scripts and services on every page that includes a particular control, you can remove them from the control. 您可以再將它們加入個別的頁面使用改用控制。You can then add them to individual pages by using the control instead. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                          ```

span.span: ASP.NET Master Pages Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含的頁面控制項也必須包含有效控制項。A page that contains a control must also contain a valid control. 例如，如果您會繼續放進內容頁面，頁面上的控制項必須參考主版頁面，其中包含控制項。For example, if you are putting a control on a content page, the page must reference a master page that contains a control.

span.span: There is no for the current page.
\- or -
The current page is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AuthenticationService As AuthenticationServiceManager

summary.span: 取得關聯到目前之 執行個體的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object that is associated with the current instance.

value.span: 目前之 執行實體的 物件。

span.span: The object for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的物件都代表與頁面已註冊的驗證服務。The object that is returned by this property represents the authentication service that is registered with the page. 您可以使用 ASP.NET 驗證服務，或使用自訂驗證服務。You can use the ASP.NET authentication service or use a custom authentication service. 若要使用自訂服務，您可以註冊它包括`AuthenticationService`內的項目`ScriptManagerProxy`頁面上的項目。To use a custom service, you can register it by including a `AuthenticationService` element inside the `ScriptManagerProxy` element on the page. 您可以也以程式設計方式設定物件。You can also programmatically configure the object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CompositeScript As CompositeScriptReference
public: property System::Web::UI::CompositeScriptReference ^ CompositeScript { System::Web::UI::CompositeScriptReference ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得支援內容頁之複合指令碼的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the composite script that supports the content page.
A reference to the composite script.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Navigate As EventHandler(Of HistoryEventArgs)

summary.span: 當使用者按一下瀏覽器的 [上一頁] 或 [下一頁] 按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the browser's **Back** or **Forward** button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下瀏覽器**回** 按鈕，瀏覽器巡覽先前檢視過的 Url，可以包含具有記錄點的狀態資料的 Url。When a user clicks the browser's **Back** button, the browser navigates through previously-viewed URLs, which can include URLs that contain history-point state data. 如果在網頁中的用戶端程式碼偵測到的 URL 包含歷程記錄狀態資料，它將在 [伺服器] 頁面來提出要求。If client code in the Web page detects that the URL contains history state data, it makes a request to the server page. 這可以做為回傳事件，而伺服器控制項引發`Navigate`事件。This acts as a postback event, and the server control raises the `Navigate` event. 您可以處理這個事件，並重新建立使用傳遞的狀態資料與事件的 視需要在 Web 應用程式頁面。You can handle this event and re-create the page as required in the Web application by using the state data that is passed with the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProfileService As ProfileServiceManager
public: property System::Web::UI::ProfileServiceManager ^ ProfileService { System::Web::UI::ProfileServiceManager ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得關聯到目前之 執行個體的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object that is associated with the current instance.

value.span: 目前之 執行實體的 物件。

span.span: The object for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的物件都代表與網頁註冊設定檔服務。The object that is returned by this property represents the profile service that is registered with the page. 您可以使用 ASP.NET 設定檔服務，或使用自訂設定檔服務。You can use the ASP.NET profile service or use a custom profile service. 若要使用自訂服務，您可以註冊它包括`ProfileService`內的項目`ScriptManagerProxy`頁面上的項目。To use a custom service, you can register it by including a `ProfileService` element inside the `ScriptManagerProxy` element on the page. 您可以也以程式設計方式設定物件。You can also programmatically configure the object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RoleService As RoleServiceManager
public: property System::Web::UI::RoleServiceManager ^ RoleService { System::Web::UI::RoleServiceManager ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得關聯到目前之 執行個體的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object that is associated with the current instance.

value.span: 目前之 執行實體的 物件。

span.span: The object for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的物件都代表與網頁註冊角色服務。The object that is returned by this property represents the role service that is registered with the page. 您可以使用 ASP.NET 角色服務，或使用自訂的角色服務。You can use the ASP.NET role service or use a custom role service. 若要使用自訂服務，您可以註冊它包括`RoleService`內的項目`ScriptManagerProxy`頁面上的項目。To use a custom service, you can register it by including a `RoleService` element inside the `ScriptManagerProxy` element on the page. 您可以也以程式設計方式設定物件。You can also programmatically configure the object.

related.span: 透過 ASP.NET AJAX 使用角色資訊

span.span: Using Roles Information with ASP.NET AJAX

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scripts As ScriptReferenceCollection

summary.span: 取得 物件，其中包含已向 控制項明確註冊之每個指令碼檔案所適用的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object that contains a object for each script file that is explicitly registered with the control.

value.span: 物件的集合，物件適用於 控制項傳送至瀏覽器的每個指令碼檔案。

span.span: A collection of objects for each script file that the control sends to the browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合，可讓您新增已註冊的任何指令碼的指令碼參考控制項。The collection enables you to add script references to any scripts that are already registered with the control. 您可以新增指令碼參考集合，以宣告方式是藉由使用`ScriptReference`項目。You can add script references to the collection declaratively by using the `ScriptReference` element. 您可以藉由新增，以程式設計方式加入指令碼參考物件至集合。You can add script references programmatically by adding objects to the collection. 如果指令碼已向或控制項，此指令碼未註冊一次。If a script is already registered with the or control, the script is not registered again.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Services As ServiceReferenceCollection

summary.span: 取得 物件，包含已向 控制項明確註冊之每個服務所適用的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object that contains a object for each service that is explicitly registered with the control.

value.span: 包含 物件的集合，物件適用於向 控制項註冊的每個服務。

span.span: A collection that contains an object for each service that is registered with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合可讓您將服務新增至已註冊的任何服務控制項。The collection enables you to add services to any services that are already registered with the control. 您可以將服務參考加入集合，以宣告方式是藉由使用`ServiceReference`項目。You can add service references to the collection declaratively by using the `ServiceReference` element. 您可以藉由新增，以程式設計方式加入服務參考物件至集合。You can add service references programmatically by adding objects to the collection. 如果服務已向或控制項，此服務未註冊一次。If a service is already registered with the or control, the service is not registered again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性中覆寫以避免設定此屬性的類別。The property is overridden in the class to prevent setting this property. 屬性會傳回`true`除非它是在容器中，例如其屬性設定為`false`。The property returns `true` unless it is inside a container, such as a whose property is set to `false`.

span.span: A value is assigned to the property.
